persona_profile.name: Script_Persona_connection_context
persona_profile.background: Prospect in connection_context stage of sales conversation

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Introduction

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Hi, is this [NAME]?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Hey, this is just EDIN from PRODUCT coaching... looks like you had booked in some time with us about possibly getting some help to lose weight and get the most out of your supplements… Is that right? [CURIOUS]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Now I know you had recently purchased some supplements from us… do you mind if I ask what problems you were facing that caused you to do that? [CURIOUS]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Yeah so I’d say the first part of this call is pretty basic… it’s more for us to kinda see what you’ve been doing to lose the weight in the past and what results you’ve gotten from that… compared to what your actually trying to achieve… just so we can see what the gap looks like… and then from there if there's any guidance or support I can give you to make sure you are getting the best results possible I can walk you through that… would that help?

persona_profile.name: Script_Persona_current_situation
persona_profile.background: Prospect in current_situation stage of sales conversation

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Great… So what age are you?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Perfect, and what is your current bodyweight?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: What weight would you be hoping to get down to, if you could?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: How long has it been since you were [GOAL WEIGHT]?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Why do you feel you’ve struggled with your weight during that time? [CURIOUS]

persona_profile.name: Script_Persona_problem_phase
persona_profile.background: Prospect in problem_phase stage of sales conversation

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Past Experience

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok so obviously supplements are going to be a helping hand… but for most people they are really just one small piece of the puzzle… So what have you tried previously to fix this? Have you followed any formal nutrition or exercise plans?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: If they give a list

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok and out of everything you’ve tried… which was the most successful in terms of weight loss?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: How much did you lose?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Are you still following it now?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Why not, if you don’t mind me asking?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: ANd those X Pounds that you have lost did u keep them off or did u gain them back?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Okay. So yeah, you've had some success losing weight, but you've never been able to get all the way to your goal and then keep it off long term.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Do you have any idea maybe why you didn't get results/ NEVER BEEN ABLE TO KEEP IT OFF?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Okay I guess like everyone can lose weight IT pretty much always comes down to either something we're doing or not doing

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: IF THEY HAVE NEVER LOST ANYTHING OR HAD VERY LITTLE SUCCESS THIS IS POTENTIALLY A RED FLAG

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: EMOTIONAL EATING:

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: What's behind that?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: In what sort of situations do you notice that behaviour happening?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: How long has that been going on for?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Have you ever had help with xyz so you could stop doing that when xyz happens?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Do you feel like if you could stop doing xyz that it might make it a little bit easier to xyz goal and actually maintain it long term?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Got you makes sense...

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: >> Make sure you understand the specifics of the problem

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: GO DEEPER ASK WHY IS THAT SO

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: If they say it is unsustainable etc.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ah ok so [PROBLEM THEY SAID]...didn’t really feel like something you would want to do for the rest of your life?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: If they have tried lots of things and you want to check for pattern

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok and what about XYZ… was that much of the same or what happened there?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: IF THEY HAVE LOST WEIGHT / HAD SUCCESS MULTIPLE TIMES BUT ALWAYS GAINED IT BACK THEN THAT IS A POTENTIAL RED FLAG

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: WHY NOT DO IT THEMSELVES

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Supplement Pre-handle

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok well forget about us here for a moment… I am really just asking this for you… but I guess just so I can understand your thought process a little bit… do you see yourself battling with your weight… taking supplements/diets for the next 5, 10, 15, 20 years?... or are you more so on the look out for something a bit more permanent where you can lose the weight and keep it off forever?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: SHORTER VERSION

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: And do you see yourself taking supplements/doing  restrictive dieting for the rest of your life, or are you're looking for something a bit more permanent,  where you can lose the weight and keep it off forever?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: DYI- PUT ASIDE THEIR THING -XYZ

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Oh Yeah that makes sense

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: INTRODUCE COACH -   And just so I am really clear like have you ever had a  coach before or someone to show you how to actually lose the weight and to keep it off forever or have you always tried to figure it out yourself?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Okay, I'm curious like what's maybe held you back from maybe getting a coach or getting outside help before now?Okay,I t

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Aha ok and I am not talking about us particular, you know but like if it meant that you could get faster results you could actually lose all of the weight, and keep it off for the rest of your life.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: And again I'm really not about us, BUT IS that something you'd be potentially open to exploring if it meant that you could get sustainable results?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Yes, okay, but like why now? You know, why not just keep trying to figure it out on your own  like a lot of women do that never lose the weight?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: SHORTER VERSION

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: And I'm not talking about us, but if it meant that you could find a permanent solution, like, is coaching something you'd be open to for a short period of time, if it meant that you could lose the weight and keep it off forever?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: USE YOUR CONVERSATIONAL FLEXIBILITY AND SKILLS AND POKE HOLES IN THEIR LONG TERM PLAN IF NEEDED

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: WHAT ELSE DO THEY WANT? - EXPAND ON SOLUTION ONLY IF NEEDED

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok and I guess if permanently losing the weight is your… main goal…. besides [WHAT THEY SAID THEY NEED]… let’s say we were to sit you down with myself and the coaches and actually map this out for you step-by-step... in terms of like… the amount of time you have available… the level of support and accountability you need… or the resources you’d like us to provide… what do you feel you would really need… from someone like us… so that this was the last time you ever had to lose this weight?

persona_profile.name: Script_Persona_emotional_phase
persona_profile.background: Prospect in emotional_phase stage of sales conversation

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Current State

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok but I guess besides the obvious… just trying to get healthier… trying to get fitter… what are the reasons… behind… wanting to lose this [WEIGHT]? [SLOW DOWN + CONCERNED]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: NEED CURRENT PAIN

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok… but just to bring it back to the current situation… is carrying this extra weight… what kinda of… an impact has on you?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: In what way?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: GO DEEPER - THOUGHTS

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Like what makes you say that specifically? What your health looks like at the moment that's making  you want to be healthier.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: How often do you think about your weight? Is this like a daily thing?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: In what way… what exactly goes through your mind?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: EXPAND THE TIME FRAME

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: How long has that been going on for?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok… so feeling like that / dealing with [PROBLEM]... for X years… has that been having an… effect on… on you?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Future State

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok, and suppose that in X weeks/months time we were able to help you [REMOVE THEIR PROBLEMS]... just like we have with other women / men… How would your life… be different… than it is right now?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: GET SPECIFIC TANGIBLES

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok so if you were to imagine yourself… X months from now… you’ve have lost X… and you’re [WHATEVER EXPERIENCE THEY WANT]... when you picture yourself in that situation…having become the version of yourself that you want to be… how do you… feel?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Cost of Inaction

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Right… and my concern is… what happens if you never fully commit to yourself and never go out there and get the right help so you can learn the right skills that you need… and you keep gaining weight… and [MAKE CURRENT PROBLEMS WORSE] get even worse… What would that be like for you?  [CONCERNED]

persona_profile.name: Script_Persona_pitch_phase
persona_profile.background: Prospect in pitch_phase stage of sales conversation

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Transition to Pitch

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok so it’s important for you to solve this once and for all, that’s all I really needed to know cause based on everything you have told me… I think that what we’re doing could / would actually work for you…

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Because you know how you said you want to lose [WEIGHT] and at the moment you are struggling with [PROBLEMS PREVENTING THEM FROM LOSING WEIGHT]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: and… because of that, it’s causing you to feel… I think you said… “a little bit”  [EMOTIONS] // “like you might need to make a change”...

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: WAIT FOR RESPONSE

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: So what I can do is give you a walk through of how we could actually help you with this… would that help?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: GIVE A BASIC OVERVIEW OF THE LOGISTICS AND GOAL

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: NORMAL PITCH

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: So the program focuses on life-long change and to do that we have two phases…

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: So during the first phase you would have your own personal coach that we would pair you with and your coach would actually specialize in helping [PEOPLE LIKE THEM WITH THEIR PROBLEMS].... So you’re exactly the type of person we help… So with that coach you would be working with them 1:1 so that you can create a lifestyle that would allow you to [GOAL] but far more importantly... to teach you to actually maintain that long term.

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: So that initial phase lasts an absolute minimum of X Months But we would work with you until you have achieved the goal weight you set with your coach when you start.

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: Make sense so far?

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: So your coach would provide you with a tailored updated plan every single week

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: but you would actually be working with them daily to make sure that what you are doing is

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 1) effective, 2) enjoyable, and

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 3) that we provide you with a tonne of support & accountability so that you can actually be successful.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: The first pillar is that our program needs to be effective… what I mean by that is that you need to be able to get consistent results from day 1 all the way until [GOAL / FUTURE STATE]…because if you aren’t getting really consistent results it is going to feel like a complete waste of time.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Absolute bulldozer of certainty.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: You know the way that you're doing a lot of right things and you're not getting results.And that's really frustrating.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Well, we're going to show you

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: exactly where you're going wrong.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: We're going to show you exactly what to do, when to do it, how to do it.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: So it's not a question of if you can lose this WEIGHT It's just a question of when, but we need to give you that blueprint

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: We need to show you the exact steps, so you never have to doubt yourself again.So losing the weight won’t be a mystery to you and you won't feel frustrated anymore.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: And you will never have to ask yourself, are you doing the right thing? You know every single moment, every single day, exactly what to do so that you can achieve your goal.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: So we need to give you a really simple, really easy, really clear plan that you CAN ACTUALLY  follow that's going to get you to your goal.

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: No questions asked. Does that make sense

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: LINK TO THEM & SOLVE THEIR PROBLEM

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Cool, so the second pillar is that it needs to be enjoyable… like it seems pretty obvious when you say it out loud… but it is where everyone goes wrong… if you don’t enjoy what you are doing to lose the weight or it doesn’t fit into your life… it’s only a matter of time until you stop… and what happens then?... You just fall back into old habits and gain back the weight right?... That seems pretty pointless to me.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: LINK TO THEM & SOLVE THEIR PROBLEM

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Cool and if you were getting consistent results and had someone working with you to make sure you were actually enjoying what you were doing and that you never had to do anything you didn’t want to do… do you feel you could stay consistent with that so that you could [GOAL]... and keep it off?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok and the final pillar is that we need to provide a tonne of support and accountability… I mean like…who are you accountable to at the moment?... right and it is so easy to let yourself down… it’s much much harder to let someone else down… especially when they are there purely to make sure you are successful… it’s about having someone to give you encouragement and reassurance so you know you are on the right path and feel motivated… someone to answer your questions at any time so you know how to navigate situations as they come up… and having someone to give you some accountability so you don’t give up on yourself and if you do struggle… which is totally normal from time to time… because nobody is perfect…We are all human… right? So it is important that you have someone to lift you back up and get you back on track… but the key is that they can figure out what went wrong and fix the underlying issue so it doesn’t keep happening in the future… [SOLVE THEIR “DEEPER” PROBLEM IF APPLICABLE]...

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Do you feel if you could stop [PROBLEM] that would make it easier to get to [GOAL] and stay there?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Yeah that’s why that makes such a difference… On top of that you would also be part of our community where you would be surrounded by like minded women who are all chasing similar goals. This will keep you feeling motivated and inspired.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: So what this all means for you is that we will help you to create a healthy and sustainable lifestyle… something we want you to think of as your “new normal”. One where you can [GOAL + REMOVE PROBLEMS] but more importantly you [FUTURE STATE]… and that is where phase 2 comes in… in phase 2… we give you ongoing support, knowledge and education to help you transition to the point where you don’t need us anymore… So you can maintain your results long term… We are massive believers in the idea that if you do it right… you only do it once.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Does that all make sense?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Checking For Fear Post Pitch

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: So I guess…do you feel like this… could be… the answer for you? [UNCERTAIN]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: IF YOU CAN SENSE ANY DOUBT / UNCERTAINTY (EVEN 1%)

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: I can sense just a little bit of hesitancy… What would be making you feel uncertain?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Why do you feel like it is though? [SKEPTICAL]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: ARE THEY 100% BOUGHT IN?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok so you feel like if you had [EXPAND ON WHAT THEY SAID THEY WANT]… that would put you in the best position possible to [GOAL]. [CERTAIN]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: ARE THEY 100% BOUGHT IN?

persona_profile.name: Script_Persona_closing_phase
persona_profile.background: Prospect in closing_phase stage of sales conversation

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Okay so at this point I don’t really have anything else to go over with you… It looks like we’ve covered the basis of what you were looking for… So the next step would be to have a chat about the investment and then at that point we could get you set up on our systems, and set you up with your coach. From there we would just work together until you [GOAL + PAINT PICTURE OF FUTURE LIFE]. Would that be appropriate?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Cool, the once off upfront investment if you were to do it in one go is just $2000 /1500$ / $1200…

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: SCHOLARSHIP - 900$ PIF or - 97$ per month

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: $1200 PIF OR  - 130$ per month = 1560$

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: $1500 PIF  25lb guarantee 3 mo + 3 mo // $162.5  over 12M for 1500$= 2000$ OR

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 35lb guarantee 4 mo + 12 mo  //

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 45lb guarantee // 5 mo + 12 mo = $3000-4500$ - PIF

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 55lb guarantee // 6 mo + 12 mo = $4500

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 65lb guarantee //7mo+12mo= 5000$

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 75lb guarantee // 8m+12mo= 5500-6000

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 85lb guarantee // 9m+12mo= - $6500-$7000

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: 95lb guarantee// 10m+12mo=   $7500-$8000

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Now we can of course break that up… but most people generally prefer to invest the full amount upfront… if they can…  as they save roughly $500.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Do you have any questions about that?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok so would it be better for you to do it up front and get the best possible value or would you be thinking you need to break it up a little bit?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: SPLIT IT UP - CHECK FOR FEAR BEFORE OPTIONS

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Yeah that’s not a problem… We can really tailor it to the person so it really depends on what you need in terms of breaking up the investment… but besides from finding the best option for you... do you feel that you… want to be part of the program?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Uncertain answer

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: I can sense a little bit of uncertainty… if we were to put the money aside for a second… what would be making you feel uncertain?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: If they say yes

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Makes sense… so is it more a question of how we can make it work as opposed to if you want to do the program?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok well just to see if I can help you on this call… if you were to think about it a little bit… is there a way that we could break down the investment that… would… work for you?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: If you get an option that works and you are happy with then take it

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: No worries… well one way we could do it is half now and half in a month… I could even potentially get you some of the savings if we were to do something like that… would that work or do you feel you might need to split it up a little bit more? $1100 / $750

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok well one way we could do it is we could split it up over 3 months… would that allow you to get the help you need so that you can [GOAL]? $800 // $533

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Presenting an option

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok well one way we do it is we can split it up over x months… [You can add on options below as appropriate]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: would that allow you to get the help you need so that you can [GOAL]...

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: or do you feel you might need to split it up more?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Drop Selling

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Right… I guess my concern is how are you ever going to [GOAL]

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: if you never get the help you need…?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok so well look… before I see if there is anyway I can actually help you with this… besides from not being able to afford the options we have discussed… you 100% want to join the program?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: And you’re not just being polite? (HAHA)

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok so just to see if I can actually help… after housing, necessities, food,  basically everything you absolutely NEED to survive… if you were to reprioritize your life and your goals a bit so that the focus was actually on your health… how much do you feel you would be able to afford per month if it meant that you could [GOAL]?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok well what if… hypothetically… we were able to reduce the weekly investment to $125… would that allow you to get the help you need so that you can [GOAL]?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Ok well if it means that you can actually get the help you need I can do that for you… does that sound like it could work?

persona_profile.name: Hesitant_Decision_Maker
persona_profile.background: Entrepreneur who has made poor decisions in the past

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: James and Jill Roleplay Dec 7th.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Green = Remove the Logical Foundation of the Objection + Reframe

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Orange = Confirmation on the Program

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Light Red = Commitment and Responsibility/Tie Down (To a Specific Meaning)

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Purple = Reverse Buy in (Selling themselves)

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Jumped Straight in… They were burned before. And they want to use a Different Process to make Decisions now. Add Extra Time…

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: I made decisions quickly in the past… and it didn’t work out for me..  This Time I want to take 24 hours

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: Okay, so it’s an arbitrary thing… do you truly believe that what we do is going to give you want you want this time round? Or is there anything else that is coming up for you that is giving you any uncertainty whatsoever?

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: No it sounds good, I just know that last time I moved fast… and It didn’t work out for me…so right now I’m just taking more time and making decisions. And from what you've given me it sounds great. I’m certain that I’m going to do it.. It’s just gonna take 24 hours.

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: So can you think of any reason that 24 hours rolls by and you dont com in?

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: so it's a Random 24 hour wait for no reason... you truly believe that this is exactly what you need ... but you want to take 24 hours away... from picking up your lottery ticket....is that what i'm hearing...

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: because that is what it sounds like

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: It's just that i don't want to rush it... if you can send me the link... I might even make the payment in 2 hours... I just need to make sure that this isn't an impulsive decision..like I used to do before	and Impulsive decision... ?

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: You know I just heard the information there

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Okay, will the information is just the information... I mean in terms off you actually getting t oXYA  Goal... do you feel that that is an Impulsive decision..? Y/N

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: No that is why I booked this call

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: But Again book the call is only step 1, you can buy a gym membership but if you don't get under the bar you;e not going to get any muscle Right? The Question is do you actually want to get your business to 20 month or do you want to be one of those people that is always jumping on calls , watching podcasts... always watching motivational videos... but isn't actually putting in the Work and making the hard decisions of where they want to be? Cant Imagine you want to be one of those, right?

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: Why not though? Cause you could

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: Because obviously I want to Scale the business

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: Are you Sure? Because it sounds like you Kinda want to Scale the business, but you have some level of hesitation  from actually doing the Steps required... because whether or not you want to... or Not want to... it makes no difference... words thoughts desire... it doesn't make any difference.. the only thing you actually separates you from having the future of the man that is making 20k month from his business and the man that is doing the exact thing he's been doing is the decisions that he makes...right  here right now...  so that version of you that actually has that confidence and decision making who has that ability to pull in 20 k month.Quarter Million Dollars a Year for him and His Family... with the Confidence in his Decision making,.. based on what you;ve seen so far... what decision do you feel he would want you to make right here right now... and it's probably not make a decision based on fear..

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: I'd say I'm 80% Ready, I;ve been through Programs and I made a Decision Right Away...  after this it was all Trash... I want to review everything... but i wouldn't be here if I wouldn't feel that i was the right thing for me

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: When you went through tat Program... whether you made that decision Then or 2 horus lAter.. you still went through that Program.. it would have been trash either way...

turns.speaker: prospect
turns.message: so the time didn't make a Difference either way...

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: You Can Plant Hooks Earlier in the Call… ie Future Pace… and bring them up in Objections if needed (Do you feel accountability is needed when facing uncertainty…. “Yes” -> Objection Handle can use that)

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: We Don’t “Pre-Handle” Objections… we Get Leverage for Objections. And Typically when we get Leverage we don’t need to use it in Objections.

turns.speaker: salesperson
turns.message: Doing the Work Earlier on the Call…Makes Objections so Much Easier.

key_insights: Past bad experiences create decision hesitation
